messages.message: Hows everyones favorite Geopolitical Powerhouse?

messages.message: feeling grand.  Not sure if we directly impact each other for a while but we both border people who do.  I still haven't decided what i'm going to do but knowing if you'll be opening against france or not will help me figure it out.

messages.message: Greetings from new Italy! Would love to get your thoughts on France and Germany
messages.input: My response to ENGLAND:'Greetings from new Italy! Would love to get your thoughts on France and Germany'.

messages.message: Italy typically wants to involve itself more on the Eastern triangle, but it still borders both
messages.input: My response to ENGLAND:'Italy typically wants to involve itself more on the Eastern triangle, but it still borders both'.

messages.message: In the west, I am likely to play as an opportunist - if you ally with one against the third, I will help the two of you for a center or two, but otherwise I won't get involved

messages.message: So I guess you can view me as a resource in that sense
messages.input: My response to ENGLAND:'So I guess you can view me as a resource in that sense'.

messages.message: Well considering the opening, I’d say I’m anti France. I will be working with Germany against France. Pressure in piedmont and Med would be appreciated. You’re bound to pick up a few dots if Germany and I work well against France.
messages.input: Message from ENGLAND:'Well considering the opening, I’d say I’m anti France. I will be working with Germany against France. Pressure in piedmont and Med would be appreciated. You’re bound to pick up a few dots if Germany and I work well against France.'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F ION C A APU - TUN, A VEN - TRI, A APU - TUN VIA. Should I trust ENGLAND?
